hero.title: A new way of luxury living
hero.subtitle: Calablanca Residences · Sitges

welcome.title: Welcome to Cala Blanca Residences
paragraphs: A new development property by AX Partners, consisting of two residential buildings with 29 homes and a commercial space, located in La Plana, one of the quietest and most valued areas of Sitges.
A place designed to enjoy space, natural light and well-being, without giving up luxury.
Most homes are over 100 m², featuring open interiors and spacious terraces with open views of the Mediterranean surroundings.

Each layout has been carefully designed to offer a comfortable, functional and elegant living experience. Homes with 1 to 4 bedrooms, terraces and private gardens, noble materials and high-quality finishes.

sections.title: Passivhaus
sections.tagline: A home that cares for you and the environment
sections.description: Calablanca Residences has been designed under Passivhaus standards, guaranteeing minimal energy consumption together with high interior comfort.
features: High performance thermal and acoustic insulation
sections.closing: Living better also means living more efficiently.

sections.title: Common Areas
sections.description: A residential environment where every common space has been carefully designed to foster community and the well-being of all residents.
sections.closing: Enjoying the best of community life.

sections.title: Interiors
sections.description: Bright and functional interiors, where every detail has been selected to create an atmosphere of comfort and timeless elegance.
features: Open kitchen to living dining room
sections.closing: A home where every detail matters.

location.title: Location
location.subtitle: Sitges · Mediterranean in its purest form
location.description: Just 30 minutes from Barcelona, Sitges is an elegant and sophisticated coastal enclave, surrounded by the Garraf natural park and known for its Mediterranean lifestyle.

distances.beach: A few minutes from the beach and Sitges center
distances.services: Close to international schools and services

location.mapAlt: Location map of Calablanca Residences in Sitges
poi: Church of Sant Bartomeu and Santa Tecla
